title: Smart Data Models - Ucifi / Actuation
description: This IPSO object is dedicated to remote actuation such as ON/OFF action or dimming. A multi-state output can also be described as a string. This is useful to send pilot wire orders for instance. It also provides a resource to reflect the time that the device has been switched on.. objectID:'3306'. objectURN:'urn:oma:lwm2m:ext:3306:1.1'. lwm2mVersion:'1.0'. objectVersion:'1.1'. multipleInstances:'Multiple'. mandatory:'Optional'.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `Actuation`.

On/Off.description: Property. On/off control. Boolean value where True is On and False is Off.. resourceID:'5850'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.

Dimmer.description: Property. This resource represents a dimmer setting, which has an Integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.. resourceID:'5851'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'/100'.

On time.description: Property. The time in seconds that the device has been on. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.. resourceID:'5852'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'s'.

Multi-state Output.description: Property. A string describing a state for multiple level output such as Pilot Wire.. resourceID:'5853'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Application Type.description: Property. The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.. resourceID:'5750'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Timestamp.description: Property. The timestamp of when the measurement was performed.. resourceID:'5518'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Fractional Timestamp.description: Property. Fractional part of the timestamp when sub-second precision is used (e.g., 0.23 for 230 ms).. resourceID:'6050'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'s'.
